metadata.title: CVE-2024-26664 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: hwmon:(coretemp) Fix out-of-bounds memory access Fix a bug that pdata->cpu_map[]is set before out-of-bounds check. The problem might be triggered onsystems with more than 128 cores per package.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
